snippet.title: Farlanders - Turn Based Sci-Fi Martian Colony Builder
snippet.description:
The Farlanders Gameplay with Splat! Let's Play The Farlanders and check out a game where you'll terraform and build a new world on mars!

Download Farlanders : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1318740/Farlanders/
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/itspossible/farlanders
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Nerd Castle on Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/splattercatgaming
Twitter : https://twitter.com/SplattrCatGames
Discord : https://discord.gg/Splattercatgaming
Support The Nerd Castle on Patreon : www.patreon.com/splattercat
Steam Curator : http://steamcommunity.com/groups/Splattercat#curation
